alert.note: Alert for Garvin; Murray; Pontotoc (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 17 at 5:14PM CST until December 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... Southwestern Pontotoc County in east central Oklahoma... Northeastern Murray County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 600 PM CST. * At 514 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northwest of Sulphur, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ada, Sulphur, Davis, Roff, Fitzhugh, Hickory, Scullin and Fittstown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
